bUseAudioAttenuation: Whether or not should Audio Attenuation be used by default, for Non-Game Worlds
bPinSoundCueInAssetMenu: Whether to pin the Sound Cue asset type when creating new assets. Requires editor restart to take effect.
bPinSoundCueTemplateInAssetMenu: Whether to pin the Sound Cue Template asset type when creating new assets. Requires editor restart to take effect.
bPinSoundAttenuationInAssetMenu: Whether to pin the Sound Attenuation asset type when creating new assets. Requires editor restart to take effect.
bPinSoundConcurrencyInAssetMenu: Whether to pin the Sound Concurrency asset type when creating new assets. Requires editor restart to take effect.
